loading.message: No hay capítulos disponibles, crea los tuyos propios

save.title: Los capítulos no pudieron ser salvados

publish.title: Los capítulos no pudieron ser publicados

save.title: ¡Capítulo salvado con éxito!
save.message: Los segmentos fueron guardados con éxito. Para publicar los capítulos, seleccione 'Publicar'

publish.title: ¡Capítulo salvado con éxito!
publish.message: ¡Los segmentos fueron cargados con éxito y serán procesados pronto!

update.title: Update | Delete closest chapter
update.message: Searches for closest chapter on timeline from current time. You can use the control buttons to seek 1 second to the left or right to find the right position for updates.

addMarker.title: Add chapter
addMarker.message: Set the startpoint of a Chapter, the next chapter will set the duration of the previous one automaticly.

deleteAll.title: Delete all | Reload
deleteAll.message: Delete all chapter for editing or reload them from server.

saveAndPublish.title: Save | Publish
saveAndPublish.message: Save chapter temporarily for later editing or publish them to the video Platform.

table.title: Table
table.message: Change time, edit title (not shown in Videoplayer yet), play or delete chapter.

editor.title: introduction Tour
editor.message: Chapters are segments of the video, displayed in the player for faster navigation through a video. The chapters are created automatically based on detected slide transitions. For some reasons, you might want to edit, change or update your chapters. This tool will help you to do this.
